args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Loss of Drive Power from Cooling Pump Failure

Isuzu Motors Limited (Isuzu) is recalling certain 2025 NRR EV trucks.  Due to a mix of incompatible coolants, debris may build up in the cooling system, causing the cooling pump to fail.A cooling pump failure can cause a loss of drive power, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 73.0
